content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, the apartment is in high demand, and I'm sure you'll find it to be a great investment. I'm sure we can find a fair price that suits both of us. What price range were you thinking about? Remember, the apartment is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your time, Mr. Schmidt. I'm impressed by the location and the quality of the apartment. I'm flexible with the price, but I'm looking for the best deal. Could we start with a lower offer?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Certainly, Mr. Wang. I understand that you're looking for the best deal. However, the apartment is in high demand and its prime location in the city center makes it a valuable asset. I'm willing to hear your offer, but please bear in mind that I'm aiming for the highest possible price. Remember, the apartment is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Mr. Schmidt. I'm prepared to offer 800 Euros per month for the apartment. This takes into account the quality of the apartment and its location.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, Mr. Wang. However, I must mention that the apartment's prime location and high demand make it a valuable asset. I am willing to negotiate, but 800 Euros seems too low for such a prime location. Remember, the apartment is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mr. Schmidt. I'm willing to reconsider my offer. How about 900 Euros per month? This reflects the value of the apartment and its amenities.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you for your reconsideration, Mr. Wang. I must admit that 900 Euros is a step closer to the price I'm aiming for. However, I believe the apartment's prime location and high demand still justify a higher price. Remember, the apartment is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mr. Schmidt. To reflect the premium nature of the apartment, I'm prepared to increase my offer to 1000 Euros per month. This is my final offer, considering the apartment's location and amenities.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your understanding of the apartment's premium nature, Mr. Wang. Your final offer of 1000 Euros per month is indeed closer to the price I had in mind. I accept your offer of 1000 Euros per month. Therefore, the rental price is agreed upon as 1000 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month!
name: Haoyu Wang from China
